md:
giải nghĩa từ "pant" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Pant (noun)
	* Meaning: a type of clothing that covers the legs, typically worn by men and boys.
	* Example sentence: "He put on his favorite pant and went to the party."
	* Related words: trousers, jeans, shorts, skirt.
2. Pant (verb)
	* Meaning: to breathe heavily, often because of physical effort or excitement.
	* Example sentence: "She panted after running up the stairs."
	* Related words: breathe, gasp, wheeze, sigh.
3. Pant (verb)
	* Meaning: to make a hissing sound, like a steam engine.
	* Example sentence: "The old train panted as it climbed up the hill."
	* Related words: hiss, chug, puff, whistle.

Note: The verb "pant" can also mean to make a loud, excited noise, like a dog or an animal, but this meaning is less common.

In Vietnamese, "pant" can be translated to:

* Quần (noun) - for the clothing type.
* Thở (verb) - for the action of breathing heavily.
* Phì (verb) - for the sound of a steam engine.

For example:

* "Anh ấy mặc quần yêu thích của mình và đi đến bữa tiệc." (He put on his favorite pant and went to the party.)
* "Cô ấy thở sau khi chạy lên cầu thang." (She panted after running up the stairs.)
* "Tàu hỏa cũ phì khi leo lên đồi." (The old train panted as it climbed up the hill.)

  1. Pant (noun)
    • Meaning: a type of clothing that covers the legs, typically worn by men and boys.
    • Example sentence: "He put on his favorite pant and went to the party."
    • Related words: trousers, jeans, shorts, skirt.
  2. Pant (verb)
    • Meaning: to breathe heavily, often because of physical effort or excitement.
    • Example sentence: "She panted after running up the stairs."
    • Related words: breathe, gasp, wheeze, sigh.
  3. Pant (verb)
    • Meaning: to make a hissing sound, like a steam engine.
    • Example sentence: "The old train panted as it climbed up the hill."
    • Related words: hiss, chug, puff, whistle.

Note: The verb "pant" can also mean to make a loud, excited noise, like a dog or an animal, but this meaning is less common.

In Vietnamese, "pant" can be translated to:

  • Quần (noun) - for the clothing type.
  • Thở (verb) - for the action of breathing heavily.
  • Phì (verb) - for the sound of a steam engine.

For example:

  • "Anh ấy mặc quần yêu thích của mình và đi đến bữa tiệc." (He put on his favorite pant and went to the party.)
  • "Cô ấy thở sau khi chạy lên cầu thang." (She panted after running up the stairs.)
  • "Tàu hỏa cũ phì khi leo lên đồi." (The old train panted as it climbed up the hill.)
